summary: An ordinary American family goes on vacation to Europe. Because of the Cold War they are stuck in the U.S. Embassy surrounding by the Soviet forces.
cast: Ed Herlihy|Josef Sommer|Robert Stanton|Edward Herrmann|Rosemary Murphy|Michael J. Fox|Woody Allen|Julie Kavner|Mayim Bialik|Ed Van Nuys|Skip Rose|Leonid Citer|Stas Kmiec|Vit Horejs|Sándor Técsy|Austin Pendleton|Dom DeLuise|John Doumanian|Erick Avari|Brian McConnachie|Victor Steinbach|Frederick Rolf|Elizabeth De Charay|Taina Elg|Michael Cline|John Dalton|John Patrick Patti|Maggie Wagner
keywords: cold war|1960s|ugly american|written and directed by cast member|directed by co star
title: Los USA en zona rusa
